org.turbogwt.net.serialization.client

Interface Deserializer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type it can deserialize
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Serdes<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonBooleanSerdes, JsonNumberSerdes, JsonObjectSerdes, JsonSerdes, JsonStringSerdes, JsonValueSerdes, OverlaySerdes, TextDeserializer, VoidSerdes

    public interface Deserializer<T>
    Performs deserialization of Types.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] accept()
      Tells the content-type patterns which this deserializer handles.
      T deserialize(String response, DeserializationContext context)
      Deserialize the plain text into an object of type T.

      C      		 deserializeAsCollection(Class<C> collectionType, String response, DeserializationContext context)

      Method for accessing type of the Object this deserializer can handle.

    • Method Detail

      • handledType

        Class<T> handledType()
        Method for accessing type of the Object this deserializer can handle.
        Returns:
        The class which this deserializer can deserialize

      • accept

        String[] accept()
        Tells the content-type patterns which this deserializer handles.

        E.g., a deserializer for JSON can return {"application/json", "application/javascript"}.
        If you want to create a deserializer for any content-type just return "*/*".

        Returns:
        The content-type patterns handled by this deserializer.

      • deserialize

        T deserialize(String response,
            DeserializationContext context)
        Deserialize the plain text into an object of type T.
        Parameters:
        response - Http response body content
        context - Context of deserialization
        Returns:
        The object deserialized

      • deserializeAsCollection

        <C extends Collection<T>> C deserializeAsCollection(Class<C> collectionType,
                                                  String response,
                                                  DeserializationContext context)
        Deserialize the plain text into a collection T.

        The collection instance can be retrieved from its Factory, obtained in ContainerFactoryManager.getFactory(java.lang.Class<C>).
        The ContainerFactoryManager can be retrieved from DeserializationContext.getContainerInstance(Class).

        Parameters:
        collectionType - The class of the collection
        response - Http response body content
        context - Context of deserialization
        Returns:
        The object deserialized
